entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Richmond
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:03 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 10:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 8.7°C
Wind: E 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 near the water late this morning and this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then becoming south 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
